absRPC.description: Rich presence for AudioBookShelf media server

about.title: How to connect to AudioBookShelf
about.description: Enter your AudioBookShelf server URL, username, and password to display your currently playing audiobooks as Discord Rich Presence.
about.automaticAuth: The plugin will automatically authenticate and fetch your listening progress.

altKrispSwitch.description: Makes the Noise Suppression Popout switch between None and Krisp instead of Krisp and Standard

bannersEverywhere.description: Displays banners in the member list

baseDecoder.description: Decode base64 content of any message and copy the decoded content.

settings.clickMethod: Change the button to decode base64 content of any message.

clickMethodOptions.left: Left Click to decode the base64 content.
clickMethodOptions.right: Right click to decode the base64 content.

ui.tooltipLeft: Copy Decoded (Left Click) / Decode Base64 (Right Click)
ui.tooltipRight: Decode Base64 (Left Click) / Copy Decoded (Right Click)

betterAudioPlayer.description: Adds a spectrograph and oscilloscope visualizer to audio attachment players

settings.forceMoveBelow: Force the visualizer below the audio player

toasts.invalidColor: Invalid color format for {settingKey}, make sure it's in the format 'R, G, B' or '#RRGGBB'

betterBanReasons.description: Create custom reasons to use in the Discord ban modal, and/or show a text input by default instead of the options.

settings.isTextInputDefault: Shows a text input instead of a select menu by default. (Equivalent to clicking the "Other" option)

betterBlockedUsers.description: Allows you to search in blocked users list and makes names selectable in settings.

betterInvites.description: See invites expiration date, view inviter profile and preview servers before joining by clicking the name

bypassStatus.description: Still get notifications from specific sources when in do not disturb mode. Right-click on users/channels/guilds to set them to bypass do not disturb mode.

settings.guilds: Guilds to let bypass (notified when pinged anywhere in guild)
settings.channels: Channels to let bypass (notified when pinged in that channel)
settings.users: Users to let bypass (notified for all messages sent in DMs)
settings.allowOutsideOfDms: Allow selected users to bypass status outside of DMs too (acts like a channel/guild bypass, but it's for all messages sent by the selected users)
settings.notificationSound: Whether the notification sound should be played

alwaysExpandProfiles.description: Always expands profile popouts to the full modal

anammox.description: Hides various features related to nitro and the store

settings.serverBoost: Remove server boost info above channel list
settings.emojiList: Remove unavailable categories from the emoji picker

animalese.description: Plays animal crossing animalese for every message sent (they yap a lot)

settings.messageLengthLimit: Maximum length of message to process
settings.processOwnMessages: Enable to yap your own messages too

autoZipper.description: Automatically zips specified file types and folders before uploading to Discord

settings.extensions: Comma-separated list of file extensions to auto-zip (e.g., .psd,.blend,.exe,.dmg)

betterActivities.description: Shows all activities in the member list and user popout, with options to customize the display

settings.memberList: Show activities in the member list
settings.removeGameActivityStatus: Remove the game activity status indicator
settings.userPopout: Show all activities in user popout
settings.hideTooltip: Hide the tooltip on activity icons

betterCommands.description: Enhances the command system with miscellaneous improvements.

settings.autoFillArguments: Automatically fill command with all arguements instead of just required ones
settings.allowNewlinesInCommands: Allow newlines in command inputs (CTRL + Shift + Enter)

refresh.userOption: specific user to try and refresh
refresh.failed: Failed to refresh commands. Check the console for details.

betterPlusReacts.description: The amount of plus before :emoji: is the message to add it to

betterUserArea.description: Customize and make the user area more clean.

settings.removeAudioMenus: Remove menus next to mute and deafen buttons.
settings.alwaysShowUsername: Always show username instead of status.

blockKeywords.description: Blocks messages containing specific user-defined keywords, as if the user sending them was blocked.

settings.blockedWords: Comma-seperated list of words to block
settings.useRegex: Use each value as a regular expression when checking message content (advanced)
settings.caseSensitive: Whether to use a case sensitive search or not

bypassPinPrompt.description: Bypass the pin prompt when using the pin functions

channelBadges.description: Adds badges to channels based on their type

settings.oneBadgePerChannel: Show only one badge per channel

tooltips.nsfwChannel: This channel is marked as NSFW.
tooltips.rulesChannel: This channel is the server rules channel.

channelTabs.description: Group your commonly visited channels in tabs, like a browser

characterCounter.description: Adds a character counter to the chat input

settings.colorEffects: Turn on or off color effects for getting close to the character limit

cleanChannelName.description: remove all emoji and decor shit from channel names

cleanerChannelGroups.description: Hides all channels in collapsed categories, even if they have unread messages.

clientSideBlock.description: Allows you to locally hide almost all content from any user

settings.hideVc: Hide voice channels containing blocked users.
settings.usersToBlock: User IDs seperated by a comma and a space
settings.hideBlockedUsers: Should blocked users should also be hidden everywhere
settings.hideBlockedMessages: Should messages from blocked users should be hidden fully (same as the old noblockedmessages plugin)
settings.hideEmptyRoles: Should role headers be hidden if all of their members are blocked
settings.blockedReplyDisplay: What should display instead of the message when someone replies to someone you have hidden

blockedReplyDisplayOptions.displayText: Display text saying a hidden message was replied to

settings.guildBlackList: Guild ids to disable functionality in
settings.guildWhiteList: Guild ids to enable functionality in

clipsEnhancements.description: Add more Clip FPS and duration options, custom clip length, RPC tagging and more

settings.richPresenceTagging: When should clips be tagged with the current Rich Presence?

richPresenceTaggingOptions.whenMatched: Only when beginning or end of activity name matches

settings.ignorePlatformRestriction: Allow Platform Restricted Clipping (may cause save errors)
settings.clipsLink: Change FPS and duration options in Clips settings!

commandPalette.description: Quickly run actions through a searchable command palette

settings.hotkey: Hotkey used to open the command palette

ui.hotkeyDescription: Hotkey used to open the command palette

components.description: Utility plugin for developers to test and preview Discord components

contentWarning.description: Allows you to specify certain trigger words that will be blurred by default. Hovering/Clicking on the blurred content will reveal it.

settings.onClick: Only show trigger content on click instead of hover

copyProfileColors.description: A plugin to copy people's profile gradient colors to clipboard.

copyStatusUrls.description: Copy the users status url when you right-click it

toast.error: Error copying URL, check console for more info

copyUserMention.description: Adds a button to copy user's mention on the user context menu, works best with ValidUser.

cursorBuddy.description: Adds a sprite that follows your cursor.

settings.fade: If the horse should fade when the cursor is near
settings.freeroam: If the horse should roam freely when idle
settings.shake: If the horse should shake the window when it's walking

customFolderIcons.description: Customize folder icons with any png

toast.importError: Error importing settings. Check console for details.

customTimestamps.description: Custom timestamps on messages and tooltips

settings.calendarFormatsDescription: How to format the [calendar] value if used in the above timestamps.

about.title: How to use:
about.additional: Additionally you can use these in your inputs:
about.calendar: enables dynamic date formatting such as "Today" or "Yesterday".
about.relative: gives you times such as "4 hours ago".

customUserColors.description: Lets you add a custom color to any user, anywhere! Highly recommend to use with typingTweaks and roleColorEverywhere

settings.dmList: Users with custom colors defined will have their name in the dm list colored
settings.colorInServers: If name colors should be changed within servers

disableCameras.description: Disables cameras in a call by default

discordDevBanner.description: Enables the Discord developer banner, in which displays the build-ID

dragFavoriteEmotes.description: Adds the ability to change the order of your favourite emotes

dragify.description: Drop users, channels, or servers into chat to insert mentions or invites.

settings.reuseExistingInvites: Reuse existing invite instead of creating a new one.
settings.allowChatBodyDrop: Allow dropping into the main chat body to insert text.

settings.saveMessages: Whether to save the deleted and edited messages.
settings.cacheMessagesFromServers: Usually message logger only logs from whitelisted ids and dms, enabling this would mean it would log messages from all servers as well. Note that this may cause the cache to exceed its limit, resulting in some messages being missed. If you are in a lot of servers, this may significantly increase the chances of messages being logged, which can result in a large message record and the inclusion of irrelevant messages.
settings.ignoreBots: Whether to ignore messages by bots
settings.ignoreWebhooks: Whether to ignore messages by webhooks
settings.ignoreSelf: Whether to ignore messages by yourself
settings.ignoreMutedGuilds: Messages in muted guilds will not be logged. Whitelisted users/channels in muted guilds will still be logged.
settings.ignoreMutedCategories: Messages in channels belonging to muted categories will not be logged. Whitelisted users/channels in muted guilds will still be logged.
settings.ignoreMutedChannels: Messages in muted channels will not be logged. Whitelisted users/channels in muted guilds will still be logged.
settings.alwaysLogCurrentChannel: Always log current selected channel. Blacklisted channels/users will still be ignored.
settings.permanentlyRemoveLogByDefault: Vencord's base MessageLogger remove log button wiil delete logs permanently
settings.hideMessageFromMessageLoggers: When enabled, a context menu button will be added to messages to allow you to delete messages without them being logged by other loggers. Might not be safe, use at your own risk.
settings.showLogsButton: Toggle to whenever show the toolbox or not
settings.showWhereMessageIsFrom: Show message channel/author name and server name
settings.messagesToDisplayAtOnceInLogs: Number of messages to display at once in logs & number of messages to load when loading more messages in logs.
settings.hideMessageFromMessageLoggersDeletedMess: The message content to replace the message with when using the hide message from message loggers feature.
settings.messageLimit: Maximum number of messages to save. Older messages are deleted when the limit is reached. 0 means there is no limit
settings.attachmentSizeLimitInMegabytes: Maximum size of an attachment in megabytes to save. Attachments larger than this size will not be saved.
settings.attachmentFileExtensions: Comma separated list of file extensions to save. Attachments with file extensions not in this list will not be saved. Leave empty to save all attachments.
settings.cacheLimit: Maximum number of messages to store in the cache. Older messages are deleted when the limit is reached. This helps reduce memory usage and improve performance. 0 means there is no limit
settings.timeBasedCleanupMinutes: Automatically remove messages from servers that are older than this many minutes. Set to 0 to disable time-based cleanup.
settings.preserveCurrentChannel: When enabled, messages in your currently selected channel are not affected by time-based cleanup.
settings.whitelistedIds: Whitelisted server, channel, or user IDs.
settings.blacklistedIds: Blacklisted server, channel, or user IDs.

modal.importLogsTooltip: ML Enhanced now stores logs in indexeddb. You need to import your old logs from the logs directory. Importing wont overwrite existing logs

mediaPlaybackSpeed.description: Control media playback speed for voice messages, videos, and audio attachments

settings.defaultVoiceMessageSpeed: Default playback speed for voice messages
settings.defaultAudioSpeed: Default playback speed for audio files

messageBurst.description: Send messages in bursts by merging consecutive messages within a time period

settings.timePeriod: Time period in seconds to merge messages
settings.useSpace: Use space instead of newline as separator

settings.enableShortHexCodes: Enable short hex color codes (3 characters)

settings.iconColor: Color of the fetch timer icon

settings.onForward: Show tooltip when hovering over forwarded messages

settings.targetLanguage: Target language for translation (e.g., en, es, fr)

micLoopbackTester.description: Test your microphone with a loopback button in the user area

settings.addFreakyEnding: Add ðŸ‘… or â¤ï¸ at the end of freaky command

settings.LyricsPosition: Position of lyrics relative to player
settings.FallbackProvider: Use fallback provider when primary fails

noAppsAllowed.description: Blocks apps/categories from showing in the app launcher

noBulletPoints.description: Remove bullet points from messages by escaping them

noModalAnimation.description: Disable modal animations for faster UI interactions

noNitroUpsell.description: Removes Nitro upsells by overriding your premium type

settings.autoCopy: Automatically copy friend code to clipboard when it changes

settings.showClasses: Display the element's CSS class names in the tooltip

settings.showFont: Display the computed font family and font size

settings.noMirroredCamera: Prevents the camera from being mirrored on your screen

settings.noDefaultHangStatus: Disable the default hang status when joining voice channels
settings.refreshSlashCommands: Refreshes Slash Commands to show newly added commands without restarting your client.
settings.forceRoleIcon: Forces role icons to display next to messages in compact mode
settings.accountStandingButton: Show an account standing button in the header bar

commands.refreshFailed: Failed to refresh commands. Check console for details.

alerts.supportWarningBody: Before asking for help. Check updates and if this issue is actually caused by Equicord!

equicordToolbox.description: Adds a button next to the inbox button in the channel header that houses Equicord quick actions

settings.showPluginMenu: Show the plugins menu in the toolbox

settings.amount: Amount of clicks to trigger crossant

exitSounds.description: Play soundboard sounds when you disconnect from voice.

settings.soundGuildId: Select the server containing the sound.
settings.soundId: Enter the ID of the sound you want to play.

exportMessages.description: Allows you to export any message to a file

settings.openFileAfterExport: Open the exported file in the default file handler after export

ui.contactListUndefined: Contact list is undefined. Click on the "All" tab before exporting.

settings.keyBind: The key to toggle trash when pressed.

fileUpload.description: Upload images and videos to file hosting services like Zipline and Nest

findReply.description: Jumps to the earliest reply to a message in a channel (lets you follow past conversations more easily).

settings.includePings: Will also search for messages that @ the author directly
settings.includeAuthor: Will also search for messages that reply to the author in general, not just that exact message
settings.hideButtonIfNoReply: Hides the button if there are no replies to the message

toasts.useBottomPanel: Use the bottom panel to navigate between replies.

fixFileExtensions.description: Fixes file extensions by renaming them to a compatible supported format if possible

settings.onlyWhenInVoice: Only follow the user when you are in a voice channel

followVoiceUser.info: This Plugin is used to follow a Friend/Friends into voice chat(s).

errors.countMustBeHigher: The count must be 1 or higher!
errors.noAffinities: No affinities found. Check your privacy settings.
errors.noValidUsers: No valid users found in affinities. Check your privacy settings.

friendTags.description: Allows you to filter by custom tags in the quick switcher by starting a search with &

burning.title: Burning

star.title: Star

settings.showCopyImageLink: Show 'Copy Image Link' option in context menus
settings.preventDuplicates: Prevent adding the same GIF to a collection multiple times

settings.customEngineURL: The URL of the Engine you wish to use

settings.disableAdoptTagPrompt: Disable the prompt to adopt tags

hideServers.description: Allows you to hide servers from the guild list and quick switcher by right clicking them

hopOn.description: Hop on Fortnite or Hop on bloons :3

husk.description: Adds Husk button (check settings to change used emoji)

settings.findInServer: Attempt to find emoji of same name in server before using ID in settings (useful if no nitro)

iRememberYou.description: Locally saves everyone you've been communicating with (including servers), in case of lose

iconViewer.description: Adds a new tab to settings to preview all icons.

idleAutoRestart.description: Automatically restarts the client after being idle for a configurable amount of time, but avoids restarting while you are in VC.

settings.idleMinutes: Minutes of inactivity before restarting (when not in VC)

errors.makeSureServer: Make sure that you are in a server.

limitations.title: :warning: Limitations
limitations.description: If you don't have mod permissions on the server, and that server is large (over 100 members), the plugin may be limited in the following ways:
limitations.upTo100: Up to 100 members will be listed by default. To get more, scroll down in the member list to load more members.
limitations.friendsAlwaysShown: However, friends will always be shown regardless of their status.

instantScreenshare.description: Instantly screenshare when joining a voice channel with support for desktop sources, windows, and video input devices (cameras, capture cards)

info.wayland: For Wayland it only pops up the screenshare select
info.x11: For X11 it may or may not work :shrug:
info.videoDevicesInfo: Supports cameras and capture cards (like Elgato HD60X) when enabled in settings
info.soundPreviewInfo: We use the settings set and used by discord to decide if stream preview and sound should be enabled or not

invisibleChat.description: Encrypt your Messages in a non-suspicious way!

ui.hiddenMessageIndicator: This message has a hidden message! (InvisibleChat)

settings.apiKey: Jellyfin API key obtained from your Jellyfin administration dashboard
settings.userId: Jellyfin user ID obtained from your user profile URL
settings.nameDisplay: Choose how the application name should appear in Rich Presence
settings.customName: Custom Rich Presence name (only used if 'Custom' is selected). Options: {name}, {series}, {season}, {episode}, {artist}, {album}, {year}
settings.coverType: Choose which cover to display when watching a TV show
settings.showEpisodeName: Show episode name after season/episode info
settings.showPausedState: Show Rich Presence when media is paused
settings.privacyMode: Privacy Mode (Hide media details like Episode/Song Name)

settings.imageSource: Sets the image url of the jumpscare
settings.audioSource: Sets the audio url of the jumpscare
settings.chance: The chance of a jumpscare happening (1 in X so: 100 = 1/100 or 1%, 50 = 1/50 or 2%, etc.)

jumpTo.description: Adds context menu options to jump to the start or bottom of a channel/DM.

errors.noMessagesFound: No messages found from this user in this channel.

settings.hotkey: The hotkey to open the command palette.

nameFormatOptions.albumName: Use album name (falls back to custom status text if song has no album)

about.title: About MusicBrainz API
about.description: The MusicBrainz API does not require an API key, but it does require a meaningful user-agent string. For most, an email address should suffice.

replyPingControl.description: Control whether you get pinged when someone replies to your messages

settings.alwaysPingOnReply: Always get pinged when someone replies to your messages
settings.replyPingWhitelist: Comma-separated list of User IDs to always receive reply pings from

richMagnetLinks.description: Display rich previews for magnet links with filename extraction

rpcEditor.description: Edit and customize your Rich Presence (RPC) display for any application

rpcStats.description: Display custom statistics in your Rich Presence (messages sent, Last.fm top album)

settings.assetURL: Custom image URL for RPC (default: your avatar)
settings.albumCoverImage: Use album cover as RPC image (Last.fm mode)

saveFavoriteGIFs.description: Save all favorite GIF urls to a text file

settings.showToolboxButton: Show 'Save Favorite GIFs' button in Equicord Toolbox (Requires Reload)

settings.maxMessagesPerMinute: Max scheduled messages per channel that can fire in the same minute
settings.checkIntervalSeconds: How often to check for messages to send (seconds)
settings.showNotifications: Show toast notifications when messages are sent
settings.showPhantomMessages: Show scheduled messages as phantom messages in chat

searchFix.description: Fix search functionality by working around Discord's 5000 message offset limit

serverSearch.description: Enhanced server search with quick switcher integration

showBadgesInChat.description: Show user badges in chat messages

settings.showEquicordDonor: Enable to show Equicord Donor badges in chat
settings.EquicordDonorPosition: The position of the Equicord Donor badges
settings.showEquicordContributor: Enable to show Equicord Contributor badges in chat
settings.EquicordContributorPosition: The position of the Equicord Contributor badge
settings.showVencordDonor: Enable to show Vencord donor badges in chat
settings.VencordDonorPosition: The position of the Vencord Donor badges
settings.showVencordContributor: Enable to show Vencord contributor badges in chat
settings.VencordContributorPosition: The position of the Vencord Contributor badge
settings.showDiscordProfile: Enable to show Discord profile badges in chat
settings.DiscordProfilePosition: The position of the Discord profile badges
settings.showDiscordNitro: Enable to show Discord Nitro badges in chat
settings.DiscordNitroPosition: The position of the Discord Nitro badge

showMessageEmbeds.description: Show message embeds with options to add or remove embeds from messages

showResourceChannels.description: Show resource channels that are normally hidden

showSongName.description: Show currently playing song name in status

sidebarChat.description: Sidebar chat interface for viewing multiple channels

settings.persistSidebar: Keep the sidebar chat open across Discord restarts
settings.patchCommunity: Patch things like the Channel Browser or Members tab that community servers have

settings.name: The signature that will be added to the end of your messages
settings.textHeader: What header to preface text with
settings.showIcon: Show an icon for toggling the plugin in the chat bar
settings.contextMenu: Add option to toggle the functionality in the chat input context menu

snowfall.description: Adds a christmas-y snowfall effect on top of Discord's interface

settings.typeOfSnow: Change the type of snow displayed (Affects performance)

soggy.description: Soggy plugin with clickable image and sound effects

settings.songVolume: Volume of the song. 0 to disable
settings.tooltipText: The text shown when hovering over the button
settings.imageLink: URL for the image (button and modal)
settings.songLink: URL for the song to play

songLink.description: Song.link integration for sharing music across platforms

settings.userCountry: Country used for lookup (Two letter country code)

soundBoardLogger.description: Log soundboard usage in voice channels

settings.SavedIds: The amount of soundboard ids you want to save at a time (0 lets you save infinite)
settings.FileType: The format that you want to save your file
settings.soundVolume: How loud the toggle sound is (0 to disable)

splitLargeMessages.description: Split large messages into chunks automatically

settings.maxLength: Maximum length of a message before it is split. Set to 0 to automatically detect
settings.disableFileConversion: If true, disables file conversion for large messages
settings.sendDelay: Delay between each chunk in seconds
settings.hardSplit: If true, splits on the last character instead of the last space/newline
settings.splitInSlowmode: Should messages be split if the channel has slowmode enabled?
settings.slowmodeMax: Maximum slowmode time if splitting in slowmode

spotifyActivityToggle.description: Toggle Spotify activity sharing on and off

settings.location: Where to show the Spotify toggle button

settings.shareSong: Show link to song on stats.fm
settings.hideWithSpotify: Hide stats.fm presence if spotify is running
settings.hideWithExternalRPC: Hides stats.fm presence if an external RPC is running
settings.nameFormat: Show name of song and artist in status name
settings.missingArt: When albums or albums art is missing
settings.showStatsFmLogo: Show the Stats.fm next to the albums cover

statusWhileActive.description: Automatically set status while active in voice channels

settings.statusToSet: Status to set while in a voice channel

steamStatusSync.description: Sync Steam status with Discord status

settings.dndStatus: Steam status when on Do Not Disturb
settings.goInvisibleIfActivityIsHidden: Always go invisible if hiding game activity on Discord

settings.showGif: Whether to show a snazzy cat gif
settings.showMessage: Whether to show a message detailing which id was blocked
settings.showButton: Whether to show a button to unblock the gif
settings.blockedStickers: The list of blocked sticker IDs (don't edit unless you know what you're doing)

streamingCodecDisabler.description: Disable streaming codec for Discord streaming

settings.disableAv1Codec: Make Discord not consider using AV1 for streaming
settings.disableH265Codec: Make Discord not consider using H265 for streaming
settings.disableH264Codec: Make Discord not consider using H264 for streaming
settings.disableVP8Codec: Make Discord not consider using VP8 for streaming
settings.disableVP9Codec: Make Discord not consider using VP9 for streaming

talkInReverse.description: Adds a chat bar button to reverse your messages before sending

themeLibrary.description: Browse and manage themes from the Equicord theme library

tidalEmbeds.description: Embeds Tidal music links with a custom player

timezones.description: Display user timezones in profiles and message headers

settings.showOwnTimezone: Show your own timezone in profiles and message headers
settings.showTimezoneInfo: Show timezone info next to time
settings.useDatabase: Enable database for getting user timezones
settings.preferDatabaseOverLocal: Prefer database over local storage for timezones
settings.setDatabaseTimezone: Set your timezone on the database
settings.resetDatabaseTimezone: Reset your timezone on the database

toastNotifications.description: Show toast notifications for messages and events

settings.position: The position of the toast notification
settings.timeout: Time in seconds notifications will be shown for
settings.maxNotifications: Maximum number of notifications displayed at once
settings.determineServerNotifications: Automatically determine what server notifications to show based on your channel/guild settings
settings.disableInStreamerMode: Disable notifications while in streamer mode
settings.friendServerNotifications: Show notifications when friends send messages in servers they share with you
settings.friendActivity: Show notifications for adding someone or receiving a friend request
settings.streamingTreatment: How to treat notifications while sharing your screen
settings.notifyFor: Create a list of channel ids to receive notifications from (separate with commas)
settings.ignoreUsers: Create a list of user ids to ignore all their notifications from (separate with commas)

streamingOptions.normal: Normal - Show the notification as normal
streamingOptions.noContent: No Content - Hide the notification body
streamingOptions.ignore: Ignore - Don't show the notification at all

toggleVideoBind.description: Adds a keybind to toggle your video/webcam in voice chat

settings.keyBind: The key to toggle webcam when pressed

toneIndicators.description: Adds tone indicators (sarcasm, joking, etc.) to messages

settings.maxIndicators: Maximum number of tone indicators to show per message

tosuRPC.description: Rich presence integration for osu! via tosu

translatePlus.description: Adds a translate button to messages with a better UI

settings.myUnits: The units you use and want things converted to

universalMention.description: Mention users from any server using a universal format

settings.globalMention: Mention users from any server, not just the current one
settings.onlyDMUsers: Only show users you've had DMs with

universalMention.warning: Using Global Mention can cause performance issues and show an absurd amount of users in the autocomplete.

unlimitedAccounts.description: Removes the 5 account limit for Discord's account switcher

settings.maxAccounts: Number of accounts that can be added, or 0 for no limit

unreadBadgeCount.description: Show unread message count badges on channels

settings.showOnMutedChannels: Show unread count on muted channels

urlHighlighter.description: Highlight specific URLs in messages with custom colors

settings.patterns: URL patterns to highlight using glob patterns
settings.highlightEmbeds: Also highlight URLs in embed content

userpfp.description: Use custom profile pictures from UserPFP database or set your own

settings.overrideServerAvatars: Override server avatars with custom avatars or the default user avatar if no custom avatar is set
settings.preferNitro: Which avatar to use if both default animated (Nitro) pfp and UserPFP avatars are present

userpfp.notice: Using the set avatar feature is local only meaning only you see it change.

vcNarratorCustom.description: Custom voice channel narrator with TTS for user joins/leaves and state changes

settings.latinOnly: Strip non latin characters from names before saying them
settings.announceOthersMute: Announce when other users mute/unmute in your current VC
settings.announceOthersDeafen: Announce when other users deafen/undeafen in your current VC
settings.announceOthersStream: Announce when other users start/stop streaming in your current VC
settings.userVoiceMap: Per-user voice overrides (format: userId:voiceId,userId2:voiceId2). Right-click users to set.
settings.stateChangeFilterMode: Filter which users trigger state-change announcements
settings.stateChangeFilterList: Comma-separated user IDs for whitelist/blacklist. Right-click users to add/remove.

modal.title: VC Narrator Voice
modal.previewHint: Preview how this voice sounds with their name:

vcPanelSettings.description: Customize the voice channel panel with additional settings

settings.uncollapseSettingsByDefault: Automatically uncollapse voice settings by default
settings.showOutputVolumeHeader: Show header above output volume slider
settings.showInputVolumeHeader: Show header above input volume slider
settings.showOutputDeviceHeader: Show header above output device selector
settings.showInputDeviceHeader: Show header above input device selector

viewRawVariant.description: View raw JSON data for messages, users, channels, and guilds

voiceButtons.description: Adds quick action buttons (chat, mute, deafen) to voice channel users

settings.mode: How to show the voice channel log
settings.voiceChannelChatSelf: Log your own voice channel events in the voice channels
settings.voiceChannelChatSilent: Join/leave/move messages in voice channel chats will be silent
settings.voiceChannelChatSilentSelf: Join/leave/move messages in voice channel chats will be silent if you are in the voice channel

modeOptions.both: Log to chat and log menu

voiceChatUtils.description: Adds voice channel moderation tools (mute all, deafen all, move all, disconnect all)

settings.waitAfter: Amount of API actions to perform before waiting (to avoid rate limits)
settings.waitSeconds: Time to wait between each action (in seconds)

voiceJoinMessages.description: Receive notifications when friends join voice channels

settings.friendDirectMessages: Receive notifications in your friends' DMs when they join a voice channel
settings.friendDirectMessagesShowMembers: Show a list of other members in the voice channel when receiving a DM notification
settings.friendDirectMessagesShowMemberCount: Show the count of other members in the voice channel when receiving a DM notification
settings.friendDirectMessagesSelf: Receive notifications in your friends' DMs even if you are in the same voice channel as them
settings.friendDirectMessagesSilent: Join messages in your friends DMs will be silent
settings.allowedFriends: Comma or space separated list of friends' user IDs you want to receive join messages from
settings.ignoreBlockedUsers: Do not send messages about blocked users joining/leaving/moving voice channels

settings.quantized: Use quantized model (smaller size, slightly lower accuracy)

voiceRejoin.description: Automatically rejoin voice channels after connection drops

settings.rejoinDelay: Set Delay before rejoining voice channel
settings.rejoinTimeout: Don't attempt to rejoin after this many seconds have passed since disconnecting
settings.preventReconnectIfCallEnded: Do not reconnect if the call has ended or the voice channel is empty or does not exist

waitForSlot.description: Queue for full voice channels and get notified when a slot opens

settings.autoJoin: Join the channel immediately instead of showing a notice
settings.notificationSound: Play a sound when a slot becomes available

notices.channelFull: Voice channel {channel} is full. Wait for a slot?
notices.slotAvailable: Hey, someone just left #{channel} and there's a spot for you now!

wallpaperFree.description: Set custom wallpapers for channels, users, or globally

settings.globalDefault: Set a global default wallpaper for all channels

webpackTarball.description: Export Discord's webpack modules as a tarball for analysis

whitelistedEmojis.description: Whitelist specific emojis and hide all others from the emoji picker

alerts.importConfirmBody: This will overwrite your current whitelist.
alerts.resetConfirmBody: This will remove all emojis from your whitelist.

toasts.addedBulk: Added {count} emojis to the list, {skipped} already in the list

whosWatching.description: See who's watching your screen share or streams

wigglyText.description: Make text wiggle with special syntax (~text~)

about.description: You can make text wiggle with the following:

writeUpperCase.description: Automatically capitalize the first letter of sentences

settings.blockedWords: Strings not to capitalize (separate with a comma)

noRoleHeaders.description: Removes role headers from the member list, creating a cleaner appearance

orbolayBridge.description: Bridge plugin for Orbolay overlay integration, enabling voice state sync and message notifications

settings.port: Port number for the Orbolay WebSocket connection
settings.isKeybindEnabled: Enable keybind support for Orbolay controls

normalizeMessageLinks.description: Normalizes Discord message links by removing canary/ptb subdomains for consistency

notificationTitle.description: Adds detailed notification titles showing the sender, channel, and server information

youtubeDescription.description: Adds a toggleable description for YouTube video embeds
